name: Make a Witch ( Unity / HDRP )
description:
A game where you play as an apprentice witch who must manage the demand of the villagers. This game was made within the framework of a course with different rules. One of which was to use only 4 meshes maximum to be able to make all the game. We were 3 on this project. 

Made with Unity ( HDRP )

Links :

Artstation : https://www.artstation.com/elred
